descriptions: ["Description2-Bedroom Apartments in Skycourts, DubailandOther Units available; Different sizes and competitive prices!!* 2 car parking slots for every 2BR Apartment* Great ROI \x96 up to 10% annual rent returns* 10% expected annual capital appreciation leading up to Expo 2020* Vacant & rented units with immediate income* Long-term finance available by most banksTake a look at our 7 Years Payments Plan Option* Payable in 7 Years* 10 % Down-payment* Monthly Payment for 84 Months* 4% registration fee paid by the developer* Bonus: Free Service Charges for the 1st Year* Guaranteed annual capital appreciationOpen House from Saturday to Thursday,\xa09am\xa0to\xa06pmKey Features* 6 state-of-the-art duplex gymnasiums, 2 large swimming pools, children's pool, 6 enchanting Skycourts lounges and spacious lush gardens* 24-hour security, in-house maintenance* Cafes, salons, restaurants, clinic, pharmacy, laundry, a major supermarket and other services retailInterested?\xa0Call Harbor Real Estate NOW!\xa0Our consultants speak the English, Arabic, Hindi, Russian, Kyrgyz, Turkish, Urdu, Filipino, Czech and Slovak languages.For more info call or Whatsapp +971509166543"]
